mutants.code:
def find_longest_chain_length(pairs, n):
    pairs.sort(key=lambda x: x[1])
    count = 2
    i = 0
    j = 1
    while j < n:
        if pairs[i][1] < pairs[j][0]:
            count += 1
            i = j
        j += 1
    return count
